1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abdullah Ibnul Jarrah] dan [Abu Bakr bin Khallad Al Bahili] berkata, telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abdul Aziz bin Muhammad] dari [Zaid bin Aslam] dari ['Atho` bin Yasar] dari [Ibnu Abbas] berkata; "Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam berkumur dan memasukkan air ke hidung dari satu gayung

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَضْمَضَةِ وَالاِسْتِنْشَاقِ مِنْ كَفٍّ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Rinsing the mouth and sniffing up water into the nostrils with one handful of water
